tool_description: Analyzes weekly reading patterns, trends, and performance metrics by aggregating daily progress data.

week_start_date.description: Start date of the week to analyze (typically Monday)

include_trends.description: Whether to include trend analysis in the output

compare_previous.description: Whether to compare with the previous week

error_messages: Invalid week_start_date: Must be a valid date-time string in ISO 8601 format
Incomplete week data: Not enough daily data available for comprehensive weekly analysis
Future week error: Cannot analyze weeks that haven't completed yet
usage: Specify week_start_date to analyze weekly reading performance. Optionally enable include_trends and compare_previous for more detailed analysis.

weekly_summary.description: Overall summary of weekly reading performance

total_pages_week.description: Total pages read during the week

total_minutes_week.description: Total minutes spent reading during the week

daily_averages.description: Average daily metrics for each day of the week

reading_consistency.description: Consistency score based on daily reading patterns
